foreignData.name: Caldaia-Anpackerin
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Caldaia-Anpackerin ins Spiel kommt, lege zwei +1/+1-Marken auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Blitz {3}{G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Blitz-Kosten wirkst, erhält er Eile und „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, ziehe eine Karte." Opfere diese Kreatur zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments.)

foreignData.name: Intimidadora de Caldaia
foreignData.text:
Cuando la Intimidadora de Caldaia entre al campo de batalla, pon dos contadores +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo.
Irrupción {3}{G}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de irrupción, gana la habilidad de prisa y "Cuando esta criatura muera, roba una carta". Sacrifícala al comienzo del próximo paso final.)

foreignData.name: Fière-à-bras de Caldaïa
foreignData.text:
Quand la Fière-à-bras de Caldaïa arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur une créature ciblée.
Blitz {3}{G} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de blitz, il acquiert la célérité et « Quand cette créature meurt, piochez une carte. » Sacrifiez-le au début de la prochaine étape de fin.)

foreignData.name: Picchiatrice di Caldaia
foreignData.text:
Quando la Picchiatrice di Caldaia entra nel campo di battaglia, metti due segnalini +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio.
Blitz {3}{G} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di blitz, ha rapidità e "Quando questa creatura muore, pesca una carta". Sacrificala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.)

foreignData.name: カルダイヤの力自慢
foreignData.text:
カルダイヤの力自慢が戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター２個を置く。
奇襲{3}{G} （あなたがこの呪文を奇襲コストで唱えたなら、これは速攻と「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、カード１枚を引く。」を得る。次の終了ステップの開始時に、これを生け贄に捧げる。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.name: 칼다이아 차력사
foreignData.text:
칼다이아 차력사가 전장에 들어올 때, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 올려놓는다.
기습 {3}{G} (기습 비용을 지불해서 이 주문을 발동했다면, 이 생물은 신속 및 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 얻는다. 다음 종료단 시작에 이 생물을 희생한다.)

foreignData.name: Valentona de Caldaia
foreignData.text:
Quando Valentona de Caldaia entrar no campo de batalha, coloque dois marcadores +1/+1 na criatura alvo.
Blitz {3}{G} (Se você conjura esta mágica por seu custo de blitz, ela ganha ímpeto e "Quando esta criatura morrer, compre um card". Sacrifique-a no início da próxima etapa final.)

foreignData.name: Калдайская Силачка
foreignData.text:
Когда Калдайская Силачка выходит на поле битвы, положите два жетона +1/+1 на целевое существо.
Блиц {3}{G} (Если вы разыгрываете это заклинание за его стоимость Блица, оно получает Ускорение и способность «Когда это существо умирает, возьмите карту». Пожертвуйте его в начале следующего заключительного шага.)

foreignData.name: 柯达亚强人
foreignData.text:
当柯达亚强人进战场时，在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。
急袭{3}{G}（如果你支付此咒语的急袭费用来施放之，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

foreignData.name: 柯達亞強人
foreignData.text:
當柯達亞強人進戰場時，在目標生物上放置兩個+1/+1指示物。
急襲{3}{G}（如果你支付此咒語的急襲費用來施放之，則它獲得敏捷與「當此生物死去時，抽一張牌。」在下一個結束步驟開始時，將它犧牲。）

name: Caldaia Strongarm
originalText:
When Caldaia Strongarm enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Blitz {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you pay the blitz cost to cast a creature spell, that permanent will be sacrificed only if it's still on the battlefield when that triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don't have to attack with the creature with blitz unless another ability says you do.

If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose blitz cost was paid, the copy won't have haste, won't be sacrificed, and its controller won't draw a card when it dies.
The triggered ability that lets its controller draw a card triggers when it dies for any reason, not just when you sacrifice it during the end step.

If you choose to pay the blitz cost rather than the mana cost, you're still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its blitz cost only if you could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

text:
When Caldaia Strongarm enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Blitz {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
